review: I visited Dr. Mandal because of a neck sprain. The Dr's diagnosis was elaborate and advice & consultation was crystal clear and easy to follow.

The doctor is very cooperative and careful about patient. Very much competent to treate a patient with spine related problems. Helps to grow confidance of patient. Post operation suggestion and communication with patient is praise worthy.
If any one asked me to mark the doctor out of hundred i shall give full marks to the doctor.
